alert.note: Alert for Furnas; Gosper (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Gosper and northwestern Furnas Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 400 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Medicine Creek Reservoir State Recreation Area, or 25 miles southeast of Curtis, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cambridge and Holbrook. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
